name: Doggo Daycare
description:
Doggo Daycare is a game about petting dogs, that's it, nothing else...

Controlls
  Aim Left or Right with mouse
  W,A,S,D - Move
  Left Click - Swing
  E - Pickup
  ESC - Quit Game

There is a README within the zip folder that explains a little about the game, along with some issue I have about it. However I recommend reading this once the game is done, due to it containing spoilers about the content of the game.

Thank you for playing <3

Scott Mitchinson

Find me on Twitter: @SaMitchinson
